attributes.action: be very strict on who can have the free home computer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have just had the displeasure of standing in a school playground with 2 mums who are claiming full benefits.  One has an 8 year old child, and is at college. The other has an 8 year, a 13 year old and a husband at home.  BOTH have computers at home already and BOTH are about to receive their free computers courtesy of the UK taxpayer.  The rules need to be made a lot stricter so that ONLY those who genuinly cannot not afford to purchase a computer can have a free one.
